author: Special Correspondent
text:
The younger generation should play a vital role in strengthening democracy and should participate in the electoral process without fail for the same, said V. Dakshinamoorthy, District Collector.

Speaking at a function to distribute the new Electors Voter Identity Card (EPIC) to the college students who had enrolled their names in the poll rolls through on-line during the motivation camp held at KSR College here recently. Mr. Dakshinamoorthy said that similar motivation camps have been held in various colleges and have evoked good response.

The Collector said that men outnumber women in the census records. But in the poll rolls, women outnumber men. Mr. Dakshinamoorthy inspected the online registration centre which functioned in the college and gave away EPIC to a few new students.
title: EPIC distributed
